Breakfast: Veg Vermicelli (Sewian) / Veg poha (Rice flakes) / Veg Idli / Brown Bread Sandwich / Besan pancake (gram flour) / Stuffed Chapatti /  1 Egg white portion
MidMeal: Fruit / Fruit juice / Herbal tea / Coconut water
Lunch: 1 big bowl of seasonal vegetables,Chapatti + Vegetable / Dal + Salad
Evening: Herbal tea / Green tea / Roasted Grams / Rice flakes snack
Dinner: Chapatti + Vegetable + Dal/fish and 1 bowl of seasonal vegetables with 2-3 Rotis, sprouts, and salad.
